<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reclaimant Plea](/Feats.aspx?ID=3593) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 77</row>

**Archetype** [Knight Reclaimant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=28)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Reclaimant Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1097)

</column>

---

You call on the power of the Crimson Oath to gain magical aid. Choose one of the following spells: [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [_dimensional anchor_](/Spells.aspx?ID=70), [_freedom of movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [_remove curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=250), [_searing light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=269). You can Cast that Spell once per day as a 4th-level divine innate spell. At 14th level, the spell heightens to 5th level, and at 16th level, the spell heightens to 6th level. If you anger the mysterious source of the Crimson Oath's power, you lose the ability to cast the spell until you atone.

**Special** You can select this feat a second time at 14th level, gaining a second spell from the list above, [_death ward_](/Spells.aspx?ID=64), or [_flame strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=120), which you can cast once per day; you also become an expert in divine spell DCs and divine spell attack rolls. You can select this feat a third time at 18th level, gaining either a third spell from the list above, _death ward_, _flame strike_, or [_sunburst_](/Spells.aspx?ID=326), which you can cast once per day; additionally, all three spells from this feat heighten to 7th level, and you become a master of divine spell attacks and spell DCs.
name: Reclaimant Plea
